verses.verse: For the conclusion. Among the Hymns. A Psalm by David. GOD be merciful to us, and bless us; and may he cause his face to shine on us.
Because of knowing thy way on the earth, thy salvation among all nations;
let peoples praise thee, O God, let all peoples praise thee.
Let nations be glad and rejoice, because thou judgest peoples righteously, and wilt guide nations on the earth.
Let peoples praise thee, O God, let all peoples praise thee.
The earth hath yielded its increase: may God, our God, bless us!
May God bless us! And let all the ends of the earth fear him.
